    Package Description
    com.iontrading.mkv

    com.iontrading.mkv.enums
    Classes used for represent enums values used by the ION Bus Java API.
    com.iontrading.mkv.events
    Provides Listener and Event interfaces used by the ION Bus Java API.
    com.iontrading.mkv.mkvsub
    Classes exposing extended and persistable subscription service

    • Uses of MkvChainAction in com.iontrading.mkv.enums

      Fields in com.iontrading.mkv.enums declared as MkvChainAction 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static MkvChainAction MkvChainAction.APPEND
      APPEND action: a single record has been appended.
      static MkvChainAction MkvChainAction.DELETE
      DELETE action: a single record has been removed.
      static MkvChainAction MkvChainAction.ERROR
      ERROR action: the chain couldn't be subscribed because of an error
      static MkvChainAction MkvChainAction.IDLE
      IDLE action: the chain snapshot notification - made via a group of set EVENTS - terminated.
      static MkvChainAction MkvChainAction.INSERT
      INSERT action: a single record has been inserted in a certain position.
      static MkvChainAction MkvChainAction.RESET
      RESET action: all records have been removed.
      static MkvChainAction MkvChainAction.SET
      SET action: the whole chain changed or a set of records have been appended.
